arts.ttl: Scotland vs Belarus – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Scotland and Belarus face off in their next World Cup qualifier at Hampden Park on Sunday. Steve Clarke’s side will be looking to maintain their perfect home record and extend their commanding lead over third-place Greece in Group C, while Belarus remain without a point from their opening three qualifiers. arts.sum: Scotland and Belarus are set to clash in an important World Cup qualifier at Hampden Park this Sunday.
